description: This file contains seed script functions for setting up initial user, course, and lesson data in a TypeORM-based backend. It defines functions to upsert users, courses, and lessons, and a main function runSeeds() that initializes the data source, inserts sample data, and logs the process.

methods.name: envOrDefault
methods.description: Returns environment variable value or fallback if not set or empty.

methods.name: upsertUser
methods.description: Idempotently creates or updates a user record based on email.

methods.name: upsertCourse
methods.description: Idempotently creates or updates a course record based on title.

methods.name: upsertLesson
methods.description: Idempotently creates or updates a lesson record based on courseId and order.

methods.name: runSeeds
methods.description: Main function to seed users, courses, and lessons into the database.
